Text: Finally, the truth about why the WTC buildings exploded in mid-air and were turned into dust. I'm surprised more people don't twig onto this, it seems so obvious when you see the evidence in this documentary.

friends, don't get lost in search for the truth about 9/11 collapses.

These staged events were made possible by conventional explosives (people reported hearing several big explosions, this is also confirmed by looking back at seismic activity), and nano-thermite (a highly exothermic compound) that eats through large steel-columns like a hot knife through butter in a very short time. Thermite residues and undetonated particles were found in the 9/11 dust in 2009 by a Danish scientist called Niels Harrit.

Don't buy into the nuclear/tesla weapon/no-plane theories, these are attempts at subverting the truth-movement.

Much love.
